author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR add the fragment for the production of a Xi- long lived particle (decayed via GEANT).

This would be needed to have a dedicated production for checking tracking performance for BPH (see e.g. mkFit validation [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1087315/contributions/4571634/attachments/2329725/3969669/TRK_BPH_mkFit%26loopers_Adriano.pdf)). This sample was also used to derive the performance of the new setup used for bParking re-miniAOD (see [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33917)).

N.B.
`Filter efficiency (event-level)= (58) / (5000) = 1.160e-02 +- 1.514e-03 `

fyi: @vmariani @mmusich
